p: The docking score for compounds present in A. paniculata ranged from − 6.10 kcal/mol (for andrograpanin) to − 7.80 kcal/mol (for neoandrographolide) (Table 1) which is on par with the remdesivir showing the score of − 7.90 kcal/mol. During replication of the viral genome, the 3CLpro cleaves the C-terminal of polypeptide protein at 11 distinct sites to generate various nsps (Qmar et al. 2020). Hence, the phytochemicals present in the extracts of P. amarus might hamper the activity of the protease enzyme there by inhibiting the process of virus multiplication.
